entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
